Abstract:
The MOD14A1 version 6 product is produced every 8 days, but contains daily information.  The MOD14A1 data file (HDF format) is a 4 dimensional file, which consists of 4 Science Dataset (SDS) layers. Within each SDS layer are 8 separate files consisting of complete per pixel information for each of the corresponding 8 days. The SDS layers include the Fire Mask, QA, MaxFRP, and Sample. The MOD/MYD14 products have achieved stage 3 validation.
 
Improvements/Changes from Previous Versions

•	Refinements to internal cloud mask, which sometimes flags heavy smoke as clouds
•	Fix for frequent false alarms in the Amazon that are caused by small (~1 km2) clearings within forests
•	Fix to correct a bug that causes incorrect assessment of cloud and water pixels adjacent to fire pixels near the scan edge
•	Detect small fires using dynamic thresholding
•	Process ocean and coastline pixels to detect fire from oil rigs
•	The Version 6 Fire Mask has the potential to detect fire over water pixels. Therefore, class 3 pixel values have been changed to be classified as “non-fire water pixels.”

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FIREPIXELS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The number of pixels identified as fire within the granule

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: NUMBERGRIDCELLSCONTAININGFIRE
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The number of L3 grid cells in this L3 land tile that have been identified by the L3 MODIS fire detection algorithm as containing fire.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

EntryTitle: MODIS/Terra Thermal Anomalies/Fire Daily L3 Global 1km SIN Grid V006

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)
